ygData.subject: Re: Is the verdict finally in?
ygData.msgSnippet: You can loot corpses if you kill in the arena or if you duel
ygData.messageBody:
You can loot corpses if you kill in the arena or if you duel
----------
>From: "Mark S. Foster" <markf@...>
>To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Is the verdict finally in?
>Date: Mon, Aug 30, 1999, 5:21 AM
>

>From: "Mark S. Foster" <markf@...>
>
>That's BS, Unless your pvp, You can't loot anywhere's, believe me I've
>tried.
>
>lvl 36 Ranger of Tarew Marr
>----- Original Message -----
>From: Tony Cawthorne <tac1@...>
>To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
>Sent: Saturday, August 28, 1999 3:50 PM
>Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Is the verdict finally in?
>
>
>> From: "Tony Cawthorne" <tac1@...>
>>
>> There is a way around no drop items if you go to arena and duel and kill
>> someone you can then loot their corpse. I know peeps who have sold there
>> J-man boots using this method.
>>
>> T.C.
>> ----- Original Message -----
>> From: kale usi <kaleusi@...>
>> To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
>> Sent: Friday, August 27, 1999 3:04 PM
>> Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Is the verdict finally in?
>>
>>
>> > From: "kale usi" <kaleusi@...>
>> >
>> > >From: "Trevalien Manix" <trevalien@...>
>> > >
>> > >Getting thse things would be a result of hacking not twinking. the
>thorny
>> > >vine armor is plane of fear and i think no drop. the pegasus claok is
>no
>> > >drop too.
>> > >
>> > >Trevalien
>> > >
>> >
>> > I'm talking overall - and yes, all those items are no drop. What I mean
>is
>> > that I see way too many 1st lvl characters wearing all bronze and in a
>few
>> > cases - steel chestplates!!!!!!!! Now if that isn't twinking - just
>shoot
>> > me! It took me a month solid of 2 hrs plus a night of saving to get my
>> steel
>> > chestplate! I'm just now crawling out of the hole I put myself into to
>get
>> > it. It practically cost an arm and a leg <checks himself to make sure
>he's
>> > not missing vital organs/body parts>
>> >
>> >
